caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 96–99.
Parastagmatoptera sottilei Lombardo & Ippolito, 2015
, typical phase. 96. Male in dorsal view. 97. Same, ventral view. 98. Female in dorsal view. 99. Same, ventral view. Scale bar: 10 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Bolivia , Brazil , Colombia , Ecuador , Peru .

Remarks. Most common species at the study site. This species very rarely exhibits an interesting red phenotype ( Figs. 100–103 ), probably caused by the substrate (e.g. inflorescences) on which the specimens spend their postembryonic development.
